mapper.sql: logid, error_id, trade_day, corp_id, corp_name, pay_id, pay_channel, fee_sum, currency, trade_number, trade_time, order_id, site_id, site_name, manage_money, manage_state, payment_money, payment_state, reason_info, handle_info, proc_status, notice_flag, return_id, return_result, handler_id, handler_name, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM as_pay_handle WHERE 1=1 AND corp_id = #{corp_id} AND proc_status = #{proc_status} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_pay_handle( logid, error_id, trade_day, corp_id, corp_name, pay_id, pay_channel, fee_sum, currency, trade_number, trade_time, order_id, site_id, site_name, manage_money, manage_state, payment_money, payment_state, reason_info, handle_info, proc_status, notice_flag, return_id, return_result, handler_id, handler_name, create_time ) VALUES( #{logid}, #{error_id}, #{trade_day}, #{corp_id}, #{corp_name}, #{pay_id}, #{pay_channel}, #{fee_sum}, #{currency}, #{trade_number}, #{trade_time}, #{order_id}, #{site_id}, #{site_name}, #{manage_money}, #{manage_state}, #{payment_money}, #{payment_state}, #{reason_info}, #{handle_info}, #{proc_status}, #{notice_flag}, #{return_id}, #{return_result}, #{handler_id}, #{handler_name}, #{create_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE as_pay_handle SET logid = #{logid}, error_id = #{error_id}, trade_day = #{trade_day}, corp_id = #{corp_id}, corp_name = #{corp_name}, pay_id = #{pay_id}, pay_channel = #{pay_channel}, fee_sum = #{fee_sum}, currency = #{currency}, trade_number = #{trade_number}, trade_time = #{trade_time}, order_id = #{order_id}, site_id = #{site_id}, site_name = #{site_name}, manage_money = #{manage_money}, manage_state = #{manage_state}, payment_money = #{payment_money}, payment_state = #{payment_state}, reason_info = #{reason_info}, handle_info = #{handle_info}, proc_status = #{proc_status}, notice_flag = #{notice_flag}, return_id = #{return_id}, return_result = #{return_result}, handler_id = #{handler_id}, handler_name = #{handler_name}, create_time = #{create_time} WHERE logid = #{logid}
